00006 void
00007 SgAsmElfSymbol::ctor(SgAsmElfSymbolSection *symtab)
00008 {
00009     ROSE_ASSERT(symtab!=NULL);
00010     SgAsmElfStringSection *strsec = dynamic_cast<SgAsmElfStringSection*>(symtab->get_linked_section());
00011     ROSE_ASSERT(strsec!=NULL);
00012     
00013     set_name(new SgAsmStoredString(strsec->get_strtab(), 0));
00014 
00015     ROSE_ASSERT(symtab->get_symbols()!=NULL);
00016     symtab->get_symbols()->get_symbols().push_back(this);
00017     ROSE_ASSERT(symtab->get_symbols()->get_symbols().size()>0);
00018     set_parent(symtab->get_symbols());
00019 
00020     set_st_info(0);
00021     set_st_res1(0);
00022     set_st_shndx(0);
00023     set_st_size(0);
00024 }

00027 void
00028 SgAsmElfSymbol::parse(ByteOrder sex, const Elf32SymbolEntry_disk *disk)
00029 {
00030     p_st_info  = disk_to_host(sex, disk->st_info);
00031     p_st_res1  = disk_to_host(sex, disk->st_res1);
00032     p_st_shndx = disk_to_host(sex, disk->st_shndx);
00033     p_st_size  = disk_to_host(sex, disk->st_size);
00034 
00035     p_value    = disk_to_host(sex, disk->st_value);
00036     p_size     = p_st_size;
00037 
00038     rose_addr_t name_offset  = disk_to_host(sex, disk->st_name);
00039     get_name()->set_string(name_offset);
00040 
00041     parse_common();
00042 }

00061 
00062 void
00063 SgAsmElfSymbol::parse_common()
00064 {
00065     /* Binding */
00066     switch (get_elf_binding()) {
00067         case STB_LOCAL:   p_binding = SYM_LOCAL;  break;
00068         case STB_GLOBAL:  p_binding = SYM_GLOBAL; break;
00069         case STB_WEAK:    p_binding = SYM_WEAK;   break;
00070         default:
00071             fprintf(stderr, "unknown elf symbol binding: %u\n", get_elf_binding());
00072             ROSE_ASSERT(0);
00073             break;
00074     }
00075 
00076     /* Type */
00077     switch (get_elf_type()) {
00078         case STT_NOTYPE:  p_type = SYM_NO_TYPE; break;
00079         case STT_OBJECT:  p_type = SYM_DATA;    break;
00080         case STT_FUNC:    p_type = SYM_FUNC;    break;
00081         case STT_SECTION: p_type = SYM_SECTION; break;
00082         case STT_FILE:    p_type = SYM_FILE;    break;
00083         case STT_COMMON:  p_type = SYM_COMMON;  break;
00084         case STT_TLS:     p_type = SYM_TLS;     break;
00085         case STT_IFUNC:   p_type = SYM_IFUNC;   break;
00086         default:
00087             fprintf(stderr, "unknown elf symbol type: %u\n", get_elf_type());
00088             ROSE_ASSERT(0);
00089             break;
00090     }
00091 
00092     /* Definition state */
00093     if (p_value || p_size) {
00094         p_def_state = SYM_DEFINED;
00095     } else if (p_name->get_string().size() > 0 || get_elf_type()) {
00096         p_def_state = SYM_TENTATIVE;
00097     } else {
00098         p_def_state = SYM_UNDEFINED;
00099     }
00100 }

00103 SgAsmElfSymbol::dump(FILE *f, const char *prefix, ssize_t idx) const
00104 {
00105     dump(f, prefix, idx, NULL);

00131 SgAsmElfSymbol::ElfSymBinding
00132 SgAsmElfSymbol::get_elf_binding() const
00133 {
00134     return (ElfSymBinding)(p_st_info >> 4);
00135 }

00137 SgAsmElfSymbol::ElfSymType
00138 SgAsmElfSymbol::get_elf_type() const
00139 {
00140     return (ElfSymType)(p_st_info & 0xf);
00141 }

00144 void *
00145 SgAsmElfSymbol::encode(ByteOrder sex, Elf32SymbolEntry_disk *disk) const
00146 {
00147     rose_addr_t st_name = p_name->get_offset();
00148     ROSE_ASSERT(st_name!=SgAsmGenericString::unallocated);
00149     host_to_disk(sex, st_name,     &(disk->st_name));
00150     host_to_disk(sex, p_st_info,   &(disk->st_info));
00151     host_to_disk(sex, p_st_res1,   &(disk->st_res1));
00152     host_to_disk(sex, p_st_shndx,  &(disk->st_shndx));
00153     host_to_disk(sex, p_st_size,   &(disk->st_size));
00154     host_to_disk(sex, get_value(), &(disk->st_value));
00155     return disk;
00156 }
00157 void *
00158 SgAsmElfSymbol::encode(ByteOrder sex, Elf64SymbolEntry_disk *disk) const
00159 {
00160     rose_addr_t st_name = p_name->get_offset();
00161     ROSE_ASSERT(st_name!=SgAsmGenericString::unallocated);
00162     host_to_disk(sex, st_name,     &(disk->st_name));
00163     host_to_disk(sex, p_st_info,   &(disk->st_info));
00164     host_to_disk(sex, p_st_res1,   &(disk->st_res1));
00165     host_to_disk(sex, p_st_shndx,  &(disk->st_shndx));
00166     host_to_disk(sex, p_st_size,   &(disk->st_size));
00167     host_to_disk(sex, get_value(), &(disk->st_value));
00168     return disk;

00170 
00172 void
00173 SgAsmElfSymbol::dump(FILE *f, const char *prefix, ssize_t idx, SgAsmGenericSection *section) const
00174 {
00175     char p[4096];
00176     if (idx>=0) {
00177         sprintf(p, "%sElfSymbol[%zd].", prefix, idx);
00178     } else {
00179         sprintf(p, "%sElfSymbol.", prefix);
00180     }
00181     const int w = std::max(1, DUMP_FIELD_WIDTH-(int)strlen(p));
00182 
00183     SgAsmGenericSymbol::dump(f, p, -1);
00184 
00185     fprintf(f, "%s%-*s = %u",          p, w, "st_info",  p_st_info);
00186     fprintf(f, " (%s %s)\n",to_string(get_elf_binding()).c_str(),to_string(get_elf_type()).c_str());
00187     fprintf(f, "%s%-*s = %u\n",         p, w, "st_res1", p_st_res1);
00188     fprintf(f, "%s%-*s = %"PRIu64"\n",  p, w, "st_size", p_st_size);
00189 
00190     if (section && section->get_id() == (int)p_st_shndx) {
00191         fprintf(f, "%s%-*s = [%d] \"%s\"\n", p, w, "st_shndx", section->get_id(), section->get_name()->get_string(true).c_str());
00192     } else {
00193         fprintf(f, "%s%-*s = %u\n",         p, w, "st_shndx", p_st_shndx);        
00194     }
00195 
00196     if (p_extra.size()>0) {
00197         fprintf(f, "%s%-*s = %zu bytes\n", p, w, "extra", p_extra.size());
00198         hexdump(f, 0, std::string(p)+"extra at ", p_extra);
00199     }
00200 }

00203 void
00204 SgAsmElfSymbolSection::ctor(SgAsmElfStringSection *strings)
00205 {
00206     p_symbols = new SgAsmElfSymbolList;
00207     p_symbols->set_parent(this);
00208     ROSE_ASSERT(strings!=NULL);
00209     p_linked_section = strings;
00210 }
00211 
00213 SgAsmElfSymbolSection *
00214 SgAsmElfSymbolSection::parse()
00215 {
00216     SgAsmElfSection::parse();
00217 
00218     SgAsmElfFileHeader *fhdr = get_elf_header();
00219     ROSE_ASSERT(fhdr!=NULL);
00220     SgAsmElfSectionTableEntry *shdr = get_section_entry();
00221     ROSE_ASSERT(shdr!=NULL);
00222     SgAsmElfStringSection *strsec = dynamic_cast<SgAsmElfStringSection*>(get_linked_section());
00223     ROSE_ASSERT(strsec!=NULL);
00224 
00225     size_t entry_size, struct_size, extra_size, nentries;
00226     calculate_sizes(&entry_size, &struct_size, &extra_size, &nentries);
00227     ROSE_ASSERT(entry_size==shdr->get_sh_entsize());
00228 
00229     /* Parse each entry */
00230     for (size_t i=0; i<nentries; i++) {
00231         SgAsmElfSymbol *entry=0;
00232         if (4==fhdr->get_word_size()) {
00233             entry = new SgAsmElfSymbol(this); /*adds symbol to this symbol table*/
00234             SgAsmElfSymbol::Elf32SymbolEntry_disk disk;
00235             read_content_local(i*entry_size, &disk, struct_size);
00236             entry->parse(fhdr->get_sex(), &disk);
00237         } else if (8==fhdr->get_word_size()) {
00238             entry = new SgAsmElfSymbol(this); /*adds symbol to this symbol table*/
00239             SgAsmElfSymbol::Elf64SymbolEntry_disk disk;
00240             read_content_local(i*entry_size, &disk, struct_size);
00241             entry->parse(fhdr->get_sex(), &disk);
00242         } else {
00243             throw FormatError("unsupported ELF word size");
00244         }
00245         if (extra_size>0)
00246             entry->get_extra() = read_content_local_ucl(i*entry_size+struct_size, extra_size);
00247     }
00248     return this;
00249 }
00250 
00252 rose_addr_t
00253 SgAsmElfSymbolSection::calculate_sizes(size_t *entsize, size_t *required, size_t *optional, size_t *entcount) const
00254 {
00255     std::vector<size_t> extra_sizes;
00256     for (size_t i=0; i<p_symbols->get_symbols().size(); i++)
00257         extra_sizes.push_back(p_symbols->get_symbols()[i]->get_extra().size());
00258     return calculate_sizes(sizeof(SgAsmElfSymbol::Elf32SymbolEntry_disk),
00259                            sizeof(SgAsmElfSymbol::Elf64SymbolEntry_disk),
00260                            extra_sizes,
00261                            entsize, required, optional, entcount);
00262 }
00263 
00273 void
00274 SgAsmElfSymbolSection::finish_parsing()
00275 {
00276     for (size_t i=0; i < p_symbols->get_symbols().size(); i++) {
00277         SgAsmElfSymbol *symbol = p_symbols->get_symbols()[i];
00278 
00279         /* Get bound section ptr */
00280         if (symbol->get_st_shndx() > 0 && symbol->get_st_shndx() < 0xff00) {
00281             SgAsmGenericSection *bound = get_file()->get_section_by_id(symbol->get_st_shndx());
00282             ROSE_ASSERT(bound != NULL);
00283             symbol->set_bound(bound);
00284         }
00285     }
00286 }
00287 
00289 size_t
00290 SgAsmElfSymbolSection::index_of(SgAsmElfSymbol *symbol)
00291 {
00292     for (size_t i=0; i<p_symbols->get_symbols().size(); i++) {
00293         if (p_symbols->get_symbols()[i]==symbol)
00294             return i;
00295     }
00296     throw FormatError("symbol is not in symbol table");
00297 }
00298 
00300 bool
00301 SgAsmElfSymbolSection::reallocate()
00302 {
00303     bool reallocated = SgAsmElfSection::reallocate();
00304 
00305     /* Update parts of the section and segment tables not updated by superclass */
00306     SgAsmElfSectionTableEntry *secent = get_section_entry();
00307     if (secent)
00308         secent->set_sh_type(p_is_dynamic ?
00309                             SgAsmElfSectionTableEntry::SHT_DYNSYM :
00310                             SgAsmElfSectionTableEntry::SHT_SYMTAB);
00311     return reallocated;
00312 }
00313 
00315 void
00316 SgAsmElfSymbolSection::unparse(std::ostream &f) const
00317 {
00318     SgAsmElfFileHeader *fhdr = get_elf_header();
00319     ROSE_ASSERT(fhdr);
00320     ByteOrder sex = fhdr->get_sex();
00321 
00322     size_t entry_size, struct_size, extra_size, nentries;
00323     calculate_sizes(&entry_size, &struct_size, &extra_size, &nentries);
00324     
00325     /* Adjust the entry size stored in the ELF Section Table */
00326     get_section_entry()->set_sh_entsize(entry_size);
00327 
00328     /* Write each entry's required part followed by the optional part */
00329     for (size_t i=0; i<nentries; i++) {
00330         SgAsmElfSymbol::Elf32SymbolEntry_disk disk32;
00331         SgAsmElfSymbol::Elf64SymbolEntry_disk disk64;
00332         void *disk=NULL;
00333 
00334         SgAsmElfSymbol *entry = p_symbols->get_symbols()[i];
00335         
00336         if (4==fhdr->get_word_size()) {
00337             disk = entry->encode(sex, &disk32);
00338         } else if (8==fhdr->get_word_size()) {
00339             disk = entry->encode(sex, &disk64);
00340         } else {
00341             ROSE_ASSERT(!"unsupported word size");
00342         }
00343 
00344         rose_addr_t spos = i * entry_size;
00345         spos = write(f, spos, struct_size, disk);
00346         if (entry->get_extra().size()>0) {
00347             ROSE_ASSERT(entry->get_extra().size()<=extra_size);
00348             write(f, spos, entry->get_extra());
00349         }
00350     }
00351 
00352     unparse_holes(f);
00353 }
00354 
00356 void
00357 SgAsmElfSymbolSection::dump(FILE *f, const char *prefix, ssize_t idx) const
00358 {
00359     char p[4096];
00360     if (idx>=0) {
00361         sprintf(p, "%sElfSymbolSection[%zd].", prefix, idx);
00362     } else {
00363         sprintf(p, "%sElfSymbolSection.", prefix);
00364     }
00365     const int w = std::max(1, DUMP_FIELD_WIDTH-(int)strlen(p));
00366 
00367     SgAsmElfSection::dump(f, p, -1);
00368     fprintf(f, "%s%-*s = %s\n", p, w, "is_dynamic", p_is_dynamic ? "yes" : "no");
00369     fprintf(f, "%s%-*s = %zu symbols\n", p, w, "ElfSymbol.size", p_symbols->get_symbols().size());
00370     for (size_t i = 0; i < p_symbols->get_symbols().size(); i++) {
00371         SgAsmGenericSection *section = get_file()->get_section_by_id(p_symbols->get_symbols()[i]->get_st_shndx());
00372         p_symbols->get_symbols()[i]->dump(f, p, i, section);
00373     }
00374 
00375     if (variantT() == V_SgAsmElfSymbolSection) //unless a base class
00376         hexdump(f, 0, std::string(p)+"data at ", p_data);
00377 }
